column1: #Text=Wikinews holds a follow-up interview with Max Riekse , Constitution Party candidate for the 2008 U.S. presidential election
#Text=In March , Wikinews held an exclusive interview with Max Riekse , one of the candidates for the Constitution Party nomination for the 2008 United States presidential election .
#Text=With the Constitution Party 's national convention underway this weekend , we spoke with him one last time before he either becomes his party 's candidate or loses .
#Text=Riekse is a retired decorated Lieutenant Colonel in the U.S. Army who served in both the Vietnam War and the Iraq War .
#Text=He is also a former public school teacher and Assistant Professor of Military Science at Western Michigan University .

#Text=He has a B.A. in Political Science and International Relations from the University of South Florida as well as two M.A.s , one in Political Science and International Relations , the other in Education and History .
#Text=We asked him if he thinks he has a good shot at winning the Constitution Party nomination and ultimately the presidency .
#Text=He replied , " I will know Saturday the 26th if I win the nomination of the Constitution Party .
